channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping, 8th September
item.description:
A tip truck released all its contents in the road. Some of the neighbours have swept the rubbish out of the road but it will need to be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lesney Park Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Furniture dumped at common fly tipping spot on upland road, 8th September
item.description:

item.title: Pothole in the road, 8th September
item.description:
A large pothole on the road outside the main entrance of Moorfield Eye Hospital. This entrance is used constantly by blind and partially sighted people and is a big trip hazard. Corner of Cayton St and City Rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cayton Street, Finsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Graffiti (Offensive or up to 2 meters off the ground)

item.title: Screw sticking out in playground, 8th September
item.description:
There is a screw sticking out from a wooden log in the Alexandra playground. It's a couple of inches and could be quite dangerous if a child or someone caught it. It's located by the baby swings, the photos show a close up and also one showing the location (screw is in the bottom left of the picture) Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Lennard Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: SE1 4HW, Harold estates, 8th September
item.description:
Hi, There is the problems with all Harold estate parking spaces. Every single day cars parking at residence parking spaces . They dont live here , just parking and walking away . We have limited parking spots for residence and cant park ours cars. One off the resident parking area singhts been removed and nobody cares about that. Please send more offten parking enforcement to check residents parking area .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Rose Stapleton Terrace, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
